citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
* A facility representative was not available on 10/2/14 at 3:00 PM to do a facility inspection.
* Inspector met licensee at front door of licensee home. Licensee stated that she was sick. She requested no
inspection be performed at this time.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
*   A facility representative was not available on 10/2/14 at 3:00 PM to do a facility inspection.
*  Inspector met licensee at front door of licensee home.  Licensee stated that she was sick.  She requested  no
inspection be performed at this time.  
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
